item.title: The new era of web development - Backendless
item.description: Introduction I am a full stack developer and all my experience was spent building SPA or mobile apps (React and react-native). I always wanted to learn another language. Here are some that interest me: Python because of edge-db. (not so much because they have a JS adapter now) Reason because it’s a functional language that’s close to JS (syntax wise) and with good support for React. Typescript because of types.
